data.title: Reduce PDF File Size Online for Free
data.meta_description: PDF too big? Compress your PDF files in seconds. Our PDF compressor reduces PDF size without losing quality. No signup to start, no watermarks on your docs.
data.meta_site_name: Compress PDF | Reduce PDF File Size Online for Free
data.text:
Start Immediately—No Fuss

Nothing to install, no training required. Just drop files into the compressor and let it take care of the PDF compression immediately.

Compress Across All Devices

We’re cloud-based, so you can reduce your PDF file size online via any browser on Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS, Android, or any other operating system.

Compress Other File Formats

Compress more than just PDFs. Use the tool’s functionality to reduce other file types, such as Word, PPT, Excel, JPG, PNG, GIF, and TIFF.

Data Regulation Compliance

We're GDPR compliant, which means we're transparent about how we store, collect, and process your personal information.

Certified ISO/IEC 27001

We’re ISO/IEC 27001 certified, so we’re audited annually to ensure the safety, security, and integrity of your information.

High-Tech Encryption

We keep your documents secure, even while you’re working on them, with state-of-the-art TLS encryption technology.

Is this PDF compressor free to use?

Yes! All of our tools, including the compressor to reduce file size, are free to use with certain limitations. You’re also not limited to only compressing PDFs; you can reduce the file size of other document types, like MS Office files, JPG, PNG, GIF, and TIFF. Simply drop your files into the tool to get started.

Can I compress PDFs with my whole team?

You bet! Our Business and Team plans give you and your team or business unlimited access to all of our Pro features. You'll also get some added benefits, such as flexible payment options and priority customer service. For a custom quote, please contact our sales team.

Do I need a paid Smallpdf Pro account to compress files?

You don't need a Smallpdf Pro subscription to compress your documents. However, with a Pro subscription, you will have unlimited access to our compression tool, plus all our other tools, so you can convert, e-sign, merge, split, and more.

How does reducing the PDF file size affect fonts?

Not at all! Compressing your PDFs with us will have no negative impact on the fonts in your documents.

Is the compress tool safe to use?

At Smallpdf, we’re committed to safety and security. We’re GDPR compliant, undergo annual audits to earn our ISO/IEC certification, and carry advanced TLS encryption, which means that your data, personal information, and documents are safe with us. What’s more, each time you perform a task, like compressing a file, this entire process is fully encrypted for full-scale security.

Can I compress PDFs offline?

Absolutely! Try our apps for Windows, Android, and iPhone to compress large PDF files on the go.
